full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SA LAM GYI RNAM GZHAG MKHAS PA'I YID 'PHROG CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016B SA LAM GYI RNAM GZHAG MKHAS PA'I YID 'PHROG 'DI NI, MKHAS PA'I SKYE BO DU MAS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG POS, DBEN GNAS RI BO MDANGS CAN GYI RI KHROD DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,AOm SVASTI, RGYAL BSTAN PAD TSAL PHAN BDE'I DRI BSUNG CAN, ,BSHAD SGRUB 'DAB RGYAS RNAM GROL SBRANG RTZI'I BCUD, ,'GRO KUN SPYOD PHYIR SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING, ,CHOS SDE CHE NAS CHOS SBYIN CHAR 'DI SPEL, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,
